sources.title: Untamed Mistress
sources.description: Title: Untamed Mistress Summary: Two men search the jungle for a woman who has been captured by a tribe of murderous gorillas. When they finally find her, they must fight off attacks by the gorillas, who are determined to keep her. Directed by: Ron Ormond, Allan Nixon Actors: Production Company: Howco Productions Inc. Release Date: March 1955 (USA) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG Two men search the jungle for a woman who has been captured by a tribe of murderous gorillas. When they finally find her, they must fight off attacks by the gorillas, who are determined to keep her.

metadata.Plot: Two men search the jungle for a woman who has been captured by a tribe of murderous gorillas. When they finally find her, they must fight off attacks by the gorillas, who are determined to keep her.
metadata.Writer: Paul Leslie Peil, Ron Ormond, Orville H. Hampton
metadata.Actors: Allan Nixon, Jacqueline Fontaine, Byron Keith
